title: Tips for Simple KDP Low-Content Research Using Publisher Rocket + How to Make Your Book Stand Out!
description:
Struggling with the research side of publishing low-content books on KDP? Here are 9 simple tips that I use to find niches that will make me the most money. I use Publisher Rocket and Amazon for most of my research, and I try to keep it really simple. Plus, make sure to watch until the end for some tips on how to make your book better than your competition.

As always, do yourself a favor and watch at 1.5x speed. :)

Try Canva Pro for free! https://partner.canva.com/EaDVW9
